module.name: webinterface
module.description: The webinterface module is an Arclink client for retrieving waveforms based on events or inventory.

group.name: arclink
group.description: Parameters relating to connections to the Arclink server(s) supporting webinterface.

parameter.name: address
parameter.description: The server to connect to, given as hostname:port

parameter.name: request
parameter.description: Timeout, in seconds, for XXX requests?

group.name: event
group.description: Parameters relating to event look-up services.

parameter.name: defaultLimit
parameter.description: Maximum number of events which are returned if no other limit is set.

parameter.name: verbosity
parameter.description: Verbosity level a la SeisComP logging.level. How chatty should event service be? This specifies logging on the server. 0:quiet, 1:error, 2:warning, 3:info, 4:debug.

parameter.name: ids
parameter.description: List of all event services which will be enabled. Include 'parser' here to support file upload. For each service, there must be an EventService object with a handler method suitable for the service. There may be more than one instance of each EventService with different configuration parameters (e.g. different baseURL), in which case they are distinguished by the names here.

parameter.name: preferred
parameter.description: The preferred service appears first in the pull-down menu of event services.

parameter.name: registeredOnly
parameter.description: *NOT NEEDED??* If this parameter is 'true', any service, e.g. {id}, with no description will be *hidden*. That is, it will be registered, so requests to "/event/{id}" will be handled, but it will not be listed in the "Events Services" dialog box. Only those services with a non-empty "description" attribute will be displayed.

parameter.name: lookupIfEmpty
parameter.description: If an event service does not provide a region name (e.g. an F.-E. region) should we look it up?

parameter.name: lookupIfGiven
parameter.description: If an event service *does* provide a region name (e.g. an F.-E. region) should we look it up anyway, and override what was supplied up?

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: Short description for this target event service. This is provided in the catalog (/event/catalogs). It is displayed in the presentation layer under XXX.

parameter.name: baseURL
parameter.description: URL of the target event service. In forming queries of service {name}, baseURL is followed by '?' and any parameters, followed by event.service.{name}.extraParams

parameter.name: extraParams
parameter.description: Any additional string which needs appending to URLs for queries of the target event service. In forming queries of service {name}, extraParams is added to form the URL ``event.service{name}.baseURL?{request parameters}&{extraParams}``

group.name: js
group.description: Parameters relating to JavaScript. These are read in by the Python WSGI and served to the browser when ...

parameter.name: maptype
parameter.description: Type of OpenLayers map to produce. Can be one of: wms, google, osm.

parameter.name: layer
parameter.description: Parameter for Google

parameter.name: server
parameter.description: URL, location of the WMS map server

parameter.name: layer
parameter.description: Parameter for WMS

group.name: events
group.description: These parameters are used in forming the Event Search Control.

parameter.name: date_startoffset
parameter.description: Relative time for setting the default 'start' field in the Event Search Control. Use `d`, `w`, `m`, `y` for days, weeks, months or years; this value is interpreted by the jQueryUI datepicker .

parameter.name: magnitudes_minimum
parameter.description: Default lower magnitude limit for events

parameter.name: depth_minimum
parameter.description: Default smallest depth limit (in kilometres) for events.

parameter.name: depth_maximum
parameter.description: Default largest depth limit (in kilometres) for events.

parameter.name: coordinates_north
parameter.description: Default northern latitude limit (in degrees) for rectangular region search.

parameter.name: coordinates_south
parameter.description: Default southern latitude limit (in degrees) for rectangular region search.

parameter.name: coordinates_west
parameter.description: Default western longitude limit (in degrees) for rectangular region search.

parameter.name: coordinates_east
parameter.description: Default eastern longitude limit (in degrees) for rectangular region search.
